sentences.sContent: IT organizations working in an environment with compliance requirements must to be able to document that they have designed, implemented, and tested the application in accordance with these standards.
sentences.sContent_eng: IT organizations working in an environment with compliance requirements must to be able to document that they have designed, implemented, and tested the application in accordance with these standards.
sentences.sCn: 工作在有法规遵循要求的环境中的IT组织必须能够证明他们已经计划、执行，并测试了这个应用软件与这些标准是保持一致的。
